<h3 data-id="heading-1">效果介绍</h3>
<p>液态玻璃（Liquid Glass）是一种极具现代感的UI视觉风格，常见于高端网站和操作系统界面。它通过多层叠加、模糊、光泽、滤镜等技术，模拟出玻璃的通透、折射和高光质感。苹果的这次系统设计更新，带火了这一设计效果，本教程将带你一步步实现一个带有3D灵动倾斜交互的液态玻璃登录卡片。</p>
<p>实际效果：</p>
<p><img src="https://p9-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/278f1066fd7d441aa0f88c1c3ae3f0ad~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg5YmN56uv5LiN56uv6ZKx:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1752800858&amp;x-signature=Ref8NqwZWCRtZ9IEFTdBxSMkmdE%3D" alt="PixPin_2025-06-14_23-07-12.gif" loading="lazy"></p>
<hr>
<h3 data-id="heading-2">技术原理解析</h3>
<h4 data-id="heading-3">1. 多层叠加</h4>
<p>液态玻璃效果的核心是多层视觉叠加：</p>
<ul>
<li><strong>模糊层（blur）</strong>：让背景内容变得虚化，产生玻璃的通透感。</li>
<li><strong>色调层（tint）</strong>：为玻璃加上一层淡淡的色彩，提升质感。</li>
<li><strong>高光层（shine）</strong>：模拟玻璃边缘的高光和内阴影，增强立体感。</li>
<li><strong>SVG滤镜</strong>：通过 SVG 的 <code>feTurbulence</code> 和 <code>feDisplacementMap</code>，让玻璃表面产生微妙的扭曲和流动感。</li>
</ul>
<h4 data-id="heading-4">2. 3D灵动倾斜</h4>
<p>通过监听鼠标在卡片上的移动，动态计算并设置 <code>transform: perspective(...) rotateX(...) rotateY(...)</code>，让卡片随鼠标灵动倾斜，增强交互体验。</p>
<h4 data-id="heading-5">3. 背景与环境</h4>
<p>背景可以是渐变色，也可以是图片。玻璃卡片通过 <code>backdrop-filter</code> 与背景内容产生交互，形成真实的玻璃质感。</p>
<hr>

<h4 data-id="heading-11">5. 3D灵动倾斜交互</h4>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js" lang="js"><span class="hljs-attr">methods</span>: {
  handleMouseMove (e) {
    <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> card = <span class="hljs-variable language_">this</span>.<span class="hljs-property">$refs</span>.<span class="hljs-property">tiltCard</span>
    <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> rect = card.<span class="hljs-title function_">getBoundingClientRect</span>()
    <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> x = e.<span class="hljs-property">clientX</span> - rect.<span class="hljs-property">left</span>
    <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> y = e.<span class="hljs-property">clientY</span> - rect.<span class="hljs-property">top</span>
    <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> centerX = rect.<span class="hljs-property">width</span> / <span class="hljs-number">2</span>
    <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> centerY = rect.<span class="hljs-property">height</span> / <span class="hljs-number">2</span>
    <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> maxTilt = <span class="hljs-number">18</span>
    <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> rotateY = ((x - centerX) / centerX) * maxTilt
    <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> rotateX = -((y - centerY) / centerY) * maxTilt
    card.<span class="hljs-property">style</span>.<span class="hljs-property">transform</span> = <span class="hljs-string">`perspective(600px) rotateX(<span class="hljs-subst">${rotateX}</span>deg) rotateY(<span class="hljs-subst">${rotateY}</span>deg) scale(1.03)`</span>
  },
  handleMouseLeave () {
    <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> card = <span class="hljs-variable language_">this</span>.<span class="hljs-property">$refs</span>.<span class="hljs-property">tiltCard</span>
    card.<span class="hljs-property">style</span>.<span class="hljs-property">transform</span> = <span class="hljs-string">'perspective(600px) rotateX(0deg) rotateY(0deg) scale(1)'</span>
  }
}
</code></pre>
<ul>
<li>鼠标移动时，卡片会根据指针位置灵动倾斜。</li>
<li>鼠标移出时，卡片平滑恢复。</li>
</ul>
<h4 data-id="heading-12">6. 细节优化</h4>
<ul>
<li><strong>阴影柔和</strong>：避免黑色边缘过重，提升高级感。</li>
<li><strong>高光线条</strong>：用低透明度白色边框和内阴影，模拟玻璃高光。</li>
<li><strong>所有层的圆角一致</strong>：防止割裂。</li>
<li><strong>表单输入框</strong>：用半透明背景和模糊，保持整体风格统一。</li>
</ul>
<h4 data-id="heading-13">7.完整代码</h4>
<pre><code class="hljs language-vue" lang="vue">&lt;template&gt;
  &lt;div class="login-container animated-background"&gt;
    &lt;!-- SVG滤镜库 --&gt;
    &lt;svg style="display: none"&gt;
      &lt;filter id="glass-distortion" x="0%" y="0%" width="100%" height="100%" filterUnits="objectBoundingBox"&gt;
        &lt;feTurbulence type="fractalNoise" baseFrequency="0.001 0.005" numOctaves="1" seed="17" result="turbulence" /&gt;
        &lt;feComponentTransfer in="turbulence" result="mapped"&gt;
          &lt;feFuncR type="gamma" amplitude="1" exponent="10" offset="0.5" /&gt;
          &lt;feFuncG type="gamma" amplitude="0" exponent="1" offset="0" /&gt;
          &lt;feFuncB type="gamma" amplitude="0" exponent="1" offset="0.5" /&gt;
        &lt;/feComponentTransfer&gt;
        &lt;feGaussianBlur in="turbulence" stdDeviation="3" result="softMap" /&gt;
        &lt;feSpecularLighting in="softMap" surfaceScale="5" specularConstant="1" specularExponent="100" lighting-color="white" result="specLight"&gt;
          &lt;fePointLight x="-200" y="-200" z="300" /&gt;
        &lt;/feSpecularLighting&gt;
        &lt;feComposite in="specLight" operator="arithmetic" k1="0" k2="1" k3="1" k4="0" result="litImage" /&gt;
        &lt;feDisplacementMap in="SourceGraphic" in2="softMap" scale="200" xChannelSelector="R" yChannelSelector="G" /&gt;
      &lt;/filter&gt;
    &lt;/svg&gt;

    &lt;!-- 登录卡片 --&gt;
    &lt;div
      class="glass-component login-card"
      ref="tiltCard"
      @mousemove="handleMouseMove"
      @mouseleave="handleMouseLeave"
    &gt;
      &lt;div class="glass-effect"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
      &lt;div class="glass-tint"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
      &lt;div class="glass-shine"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
      &lt;div class="glass-content"&gt;
        &lt;h2 class="login-title"&gt;欢迎登录&lt;/h2&gt;

&lt;script&gt;
export default {
  name: 'LiquidGlass',
  data () {
    return {
      // 可以添加需要的数据
    }
  },
  methods: {
    handleMouseMove (e) {
      const card = this.$refs.tiltCard
      const rect = card.getBoundingClientRect()
      const x = e.clientX - rect.left
      const y = e.clientY - rect.top
      const centerX = rect.width / 2
      const centerY = rect.height / 2
      // 最大旋转角度
      const maxTilt = 18
      const rotateY = ((x - centerX) / centerX) * maxTilt
      const rotateX = -((y - centerY) / centerY) * maxTilt
      card.style.transform = `perspective(600px) rotateX(${rotateX}deg) rotateY(${rotateY}deg) scale(1.03)`
    },
    handleMouseLeave () {
      const card = this.$refs.tiltCard
      card.style.transform = 'perspective(600px) rotateX(0deg) rotateY(0deg) scale(1)'
    }
  }
}
&lt;/script&gt;

<h3 data-id="heading-14">常见问题与优化建议</h3>
<ol>
<li><strong>阴影过重/黑边</strong>：减小 box-shadow 的透明度和模糊半径。</li>
<li><strong>圆角割裂</strong>：所有玻璃层都要加 border-radius。</li>
<li><strong>背景不通透</strong>：确保 glass-effect 层有 blur 和 SVG filter。</li>
<li><strong>性能问题</strong>：backdrop-filter 在低端设备上可能有性能损耗，建议只在必要区域使用。</li>
<li><strong>浏览器兼容性</strong>：backdrop-filter 需现代浏览器支持，IE/部分安卓浏览器不兼容。</li>
</ol>
<hr>
<h3 data-id="heading-15">技术要点总结</h3>
<ul>
<li><strong>SVG滤镜</strong>：让玻璃表面有微妙的流动和扭曲感。</li>
<li><strong>backdrop-filter: blur</strong>：实现背景虚化。</li>
<li><strong>多层叠加</strong>：色调、高光、阴影共同营造真实玻璃质感。</li>
<li><strong>3D transform</strong>：提升交互体验。</li>
<li><strong>细节打磨</strong>：阴影、边框、圆角、色彩都要精细调整。</li>
</ul>
<hr>
<h3 data-id="heading-16">结语</h3>
<p>液态玻璃效果是现代前端视觉的代表之一。只要理解其原理，分层实现、细致调优，任何人都能做出媲美 macOS、Win11 的高端玻璃UI。希望本教程能帮助你掌握这项技术，做出属于自己的酷炫界面！</p></div></div>
